text: int main ( ) { int * a , t , n , count , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int count = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; a = malloc ( n * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = i ; j < n ; j ++ ) if ( a [ j + 1 ] > a [ j ] ) count ++ ; else break ; count ++ ; } printf ( "%d\n" , count ) ; } return 0 ; }
